Mahadum Maritime nke Nigeria, nke e guzobere na 2012, Mahadum Maritim nke Nigeria, Okerenkoko bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke ọha na eze na-enweghị uru nke dị na Okerenkolo, Gbaramatu Kingdom Delta steeti. N'ịbụ nke National Universities Commission of Nigeria, Nigerian Maritime University, Okerenkoko (NMU) nabatara n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke Naijiria
Mahadum Maritime nke Naịjirịa, Okerenkoko (NMU) na-enye ọmụmụ ihe na mmemme na-eduga na nzere agụmakwụkwọ dị elu dịka nzere bachelọ n'ọtụtụ ebe ọmụmụ
Mahadum ahụ nwere otu ndị agha na Chief Cadet Captain mbụ ya, Cadet Uwaoma Lloyd.
Mahadum Maritime nke Nigeria bụ mahadum mbụ na kọleji ụgbọ mmiri na Naijiria na West Africa. Na Febụwarị 2018 NUC (Nigerian University Commission) nyere nkwado ịmalite mmemme nzere na Mahadum.
Mahadum Maritime nke Nigeria nwere otu ndị agha, nke nwere onye nduzi Regimental, Chief Cadet Captain Cadet Uwaoma Lloyd wdg.
N'afọ 2021, e nwere asịrị na a mechiri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ maka ịghara ịkwụ ụgwọ ụgwọ na ọdịmma na-adịghị mma. Otú ọ dị, onye na-edeba aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Dr Alfred Mulade jụrụ akụkọ ahụ
Onye na-edeba aha kọwara ozi ahụ dị ka akụkọ ụgha ma kwughachi na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ meghere maka ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ
